Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute near 47th Street/Western
ShortDescription: 94 California buses rerouted NB: Orange Line, Western, 51st, California & 47th; SB: California, 51st, Western & Orange Line near 47th Street/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near 47th Street/Western.

Northbound buses will operate via Orange Line, Western, 51st, California, and 47th.

Southbound buses will operate via California, 51st, Western, and Orange Line.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Irving Park. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Irving Park.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
